ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Python bindings to the Tree-sitter parsing library

Python bindings to the Tree-sitter parsing library

name: tree_sitter

about.summary: Python bindings to the Tree-sitter parsing library
Python bindings to the Tree-sitter parsing library

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  version: 0.25.2

package:
  name: tree_sitter
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/t/tree_sitter/tree-sitter-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: fe43c158555da46723b28b52e058ad444195afd1db3ca7720c59a254544e9c20

build:
  number: 1
  script:
    - if: unix
      then: export CFLAGS="-D_BSD_SOURCE"
    - ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - python
  host:
    - pip
    - python
    - setuptools >=43
  run:
    - python

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - tree_sitter
  - requirements:
      run:
        - pip
    script:
      - pip check

about:
  summary: Python bindings to the Tree-sitter parsing library
  license: MIT and EPL-2.0
  license_file:
    - LICENSE
    - tree_sitter/core/lib/src/unicode/LICENSE
  homepage: https://github.com/tree-sitter/py-tree-sitter

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - danielnachun
    - thewchan
    - davidbrochart

about.summary: Python bindings to the Tree-sitter parsing library
